scenes.background: Monica and Bob discussing the new guidelines.
scenes.description: Guidelines sound good, but what if everyone has a different opinion on whats urgent?

options.text: We could create a priority matrix to help us decide objectively.
options.analysis: You propose a structured tool to aid decision-making, demonstrating good perception and social skills, while maintaining balanced emotional control.

options.text: Maybe we should have a small committee to handle such decisions.
options.analysis: You suggest a team-based approach, showing good empathy and self-regulation, but motivation is slightly lower.

options.text: We can set some general criteria, but adapt based on each situation.
options.analysis: You propose a flexible approach, showing strong social skills, but other areas such as perception and empathy could be improved.
